title: IRMI CRIS Course Catalog | IRMI Insurance Agent CE and Training
text: IRMI has partnered with Credly Acclaim, to provide a digital badge for you to share your achievement and provide verification of your specialized knowledge. After earning your credentials, you can display your digital badge on your LinkedIn profile, in your email signature, and on a variety of social media and digital platforms. For your Insurance CE or CPA CPE certificate of completion, visit your dashboard in your IRMI Learning Center account.
